text: I sometimes get confused with the parameters and options listed in the documentation. What should I do to understand them better? You should begin by reading their descriptions. The documentation can provide details on what each parameter does and how to use it. I'll keep that in mind. What should I do next? Next, you should look for any examples that demonstrate how to use these parameters in practice. Examples can show you how to set options correctly and what effect they have on the code. Thank you. Your guidance is helping me navigate the documentation better. I'll follow your recommendations.
